My mom turns 50 today.

This is not a drill. 

Happy birthday Pearl. 
I love you.

The Art of Bursting Brain. 

I know I burst brain sometimes.. 
which is weird because I don’t really set out to.. at least not since I grew up. These days I just do me.. and then I see your brains everywhere.. 

Which then in turn bursts my Brain because how did your mind assimilate my vibes in that manner. . And end up blown.. my brand of the head bust is even self replicating,procreating which is far more that I asked for.. but now I want something else.. 

I find myself wanting to know how it happened..
The little details.. 
how did we get here..

So that I can like.. burst your brain on demand or.. burst your brain at will.. 

I promise I won’t use these powers for evil. 

Then again What’s the worst that can happen.. 
I’m still gonna burst your brain
.
.
.
P.S. Fine.. y’all can have that location now.. @walopetv and I have seen it finish.

“I’ll show you how to walk on water. It’s easy, ma fo, just incase I fo”

With @mandthemedix ♈️

Same vein.. I forgive everyone that has ever done me dirty. 

If M can do it, then M can do it too.

Y’all were just trying to survive, not everyone shares the grace and once upon a time I doubted it too..
.
It’s cool.
.
In fact, I’m even grateful for the demons.. 
where else will I get this energy? 

[They all work for me now and we will do the fucking most!]

📸 : @mandthemedix

@mandthemedix ♈️

Lockdown diaries - “Palm” Sunday

1. The year was 2020, the world was burning all around us but all I wanted to know what what my Devout catholic mother was going to do about the Holy Week, seeing as churches were closed and televised masses just weren’t cutting it. I feared that she would come to the dark side like my bro, my dad and I😂 

Omo that’s how I woke up on Palm Sunday to find this. Plastered on the glass door. 

Energy AF. 

It was her declaration that she wasn’t gonna play with her faith.. and frankly. Neither should we. The message was clear. 

It’s just one of those moments I chose never to forget. 
.
.
2. Fast forward 2021, we link up, My  Dad hands me this beautifully crafted Palm crucifix:

“Emeka, find a place to hang this abeg”

I knew exactly where.. 
.
.
.
I wish you strength during this Holy Week. I pray our sacrifices are pleasing in the eyes of God. 

Amen.

+1 
Or  Should I Say +0

I doubt this caption will be long as usual. 

Play Views from the 6 by Drake for the full gist. 
Bonus tracks: 
Adekunle Gold - OK (for most days)
Kelis - Millionaire ft Andre 3000 (for the worst days) 

Then say a prayer for your boy..
(So he doesn’t disappear from insta 😅)

Happy Birthday to the Love of My life. 
There’s no one else I’d rather Be (with).

Been a lowkey Stan of RUTHLE55?HARRIe since I heard The song: Bad dreams

Side note: M( @m_andthe_medix ) originally made that beat for me but started moving mad and give it to Ruthless @harry_cnc but when I heard what Harry did on it I forgave both of them for their treachery. 😒

I thought his verse was magical. And me I like being around ether so I knew I was gonna shoot him one day...

The day came he had just completed his then new single called “Dealer” and needed a cover art.

I’ll tell that story later.

For today nothing serious. We’re just claiming this spot even if you know where it is. 😼

with @sheyoo_

Dark Horse - Self portrait(2019)
.
. “Yeah you’ve been through a lot, seen some shit, Fought your fights and got scars to show.. but guess what: you didn’t Go through all that to be monster, a hollow, pained. I know people that have lost KIDS but don’t wear it on their faces.. You were made to be a beautiful beast.” .
.
.
For context I shot this back  in October. When service was rounding up and I knew I wasn’t gonna get retained. I did the job and added jara (tech support: held down 3 branches, even made sites and did photos for branding) ..but I’m not the classic “yes man” type of employee still felt my attitude needed work. Even though I knew future was in Software Dev and not  tech support..I didn’t think anyone deserved some of my sauce. Lil Wayne said: “Be good or be Good at it.” (The O.G fans know this) I lived by that motto forever. .
It’s wrong!
.
Be Good AND be Good at it.
.
Anyways that’s the story of my WhatsApp avi. It’s not a dark place. I keep it there as a reminder.

December 2019

1. If you didn’t go by road. You didn’t go at all.
2. You should go home once in a while.
3. Son of the soil. 
4. Busy. But I’m with you in spirit (yes, pun intended).
5. The less interesting way to do it.

Once upon a time when Travel wasn’t outlawed, football was on, 2020 wasn’t born and Emeka actually took pictures for fun instead of art.

To the one person that needs this:

About this time a year ago. I resolved to never explain myself or my character to anyone. Yes you can imagine the savage year it was..with me not caring what people think when I do the things Emeka does.. I also resolved to be more explicit when telling stories with my photography.. particularly the ones of the more personal nature. Beautiful stories of losses, gains, strife, survival and the fight!..In honor of the late great Mac Miller..
(may his soul rest in power)
I was Letting anyone in all they needed to do was..
“Knock knock”
..
I normally keep resolutions and such till after the fact.. but you can pretty much guess the motive from the photo..
If we’re still here a year from now.. we can talk about it. 
Till then.. Happy new new stop looking back, there’s too much ahead of you already. -
New work alert!
Muse: @sheyoo_

3. Think this is easily said? .
check it..
.
If eve didn’t eat the apple?
There’d simply be no Jesus.
.
If there weren’t problems, there’d be no solutions
The problems go, solutions stay and save you over and over again till you’re grateful for ever having problems in the first place.

So be afraid..
But don’t freeze. A better you is waiting for you to become YOU.

Been here for a while.
And I’m just starting to accept that what is meant to be will be and what’s mine has been and will always be mine[..like! Did you see Tottenham last night?!]. One won’t be wrong to say Im surrendering..letting go.  Which feels  a bit off; being who I usually am [controlling]
But yes.  Because Im willing to bet on this realization being equal to a glimpse of a part of your face; an insight to some of your ways...I hear you’re unchanging type.
After all.. .
When i really think about it.. .
What control did i ever have..Anyway?
.
.
.
Muse: @walope.tv ♒️
Photo: @emeka_velli ♓️
.
From the series Halo ©  2019

“Love ?
.
.. Oh I’m all for that; I was created from it, I eat it, need it to live, know it makes the world go round, believe in it, totally rooting for it and hoping it wins..
.
Falling in it though?
.

That’s the scary part.. Then it becomes “evoL” another excuse to evolve, like [shiiiiit!]here we go again.. where are we going again?
.
Crazy.”
.
.
.
From the series; Halo ©  2019.
.
.
Muse: @walope.tv ♒️.
Photographer: @emeka_velli ♓️

A part of me exists outside of time..Where God stays..that could explain why I always felt unbounded by it. And more aware of the flow..in simpler terms You could say that I’m from another dimension.
Or simply put; not of this world. Evidence of this is the energy that enters this world. Through my actions.

It’s something I know now.. .
.
.

But we move.

At the bottom of the barrel. You will find people that don’t take responsibility for they actions and look at consequences like “just some bad luck” but even below that. Almost under the barrel. . You will find them ones that ask you to do things they think you can’t/won’t do for no other reason but to hold you in contempt of not coming through.. but you will/do.. and then it’s awkward.

God Pass them.
No need to split it.. we’re both going to where you live..

Now look at the power he wields, all the worship..
He was on to something.” -unknown

#goodfriday

Out Of The Picture.

I hate to be the purveyor of bad vibrations.
.
Sincerely.
.
Because apart from a being of Love, I also personify joy and purity.  Anything that even threatens these truly does not belong 
to me.
That said, its not my place to assume that I haven’t sucked the joy out from a lot of
Spirits, places and other creatures.. in fact, hell itself is filled with hearts that I sent there.
.
..its the way this thing is set up
.
Even a Rose has thorns so you think twice when coming for it; Make you ask yourself: “what do i even want it for?” I say this so you understand my trepidation for fully going all in for you.  Not because I fear your thorns, (in fact they barely even scratch)but because I fear I might uproot You and send you too where every bone in my body knows that you don’t belong. And you too becoming a nightmare and a shade of a once perfect dream. But even of this.. the fear is not that strong..because I know where I belong.
.
Its the way this thing is set up.. .
don’t mistake this subliminal As me being afraid to say this to you.. but I have learned not interfere with naturally beautiful and wonderful things instead appreciate and respect them but I’ve also learned to share. .. and so, I confess.

Photo credit: @allbyphotography ♏️
Edit: @emeka_velli ♓️ Truly yours

Thoughts from a Balcony
.
Dumb and Getting older
Numb and getting colder
As I write
.
what have I learned?
.
I learned I really have nothing.. but even in that nothing.. some things can’t be taken from me.. a past? yes.. but right now those are just a couple of memories, just that.. memories.
Even though these are things I mostly leave with other people but memories all the same.

I have a future but right now thats just dreams/goals and might aswell just be conversation starters because nobody  promised that shit.. so death..I mean.. the eventuality thereof? .. yes, Valar Freaking morghulis, but as an animal I can’t think of that; the way my peace is set up..Even as I write, it doesn’t move me.its too sure and thankfully..not right now

Relationships?..one can say that.. people may  leave, yes.. but not without a piece of me.. and ever so often I carry them with me somehow.. Friendship With God? even if that one tries to hide i navigate spiritual planes like these streets of Gbagada..She showed me her face but for that smile? I will track her.
Anywhere any time, even now..
.
Right now
.
That too, I have the now, I got this moment, and in it, i am any and everything I want to be;
parts of you, pieces of me, moments that last forever?
I am everything.
.
So I ask you; what the fuck is time 
Muse(s): @mvrquiz ♑️ @ak_ogunshina ♒️ .
.

#ridearoundwithvelli #lagosphotographer #streetphotography

Stay With Me
.
It was supposed to be a happy Sunday..
Happy?
What is that? How much? Who’s selling?

I couldn’t remember ever having wiped my eyes after prayer..but really I could, it just seemed so far back at the time.. For what is it I can ask for that cannot dry my eyes, but just enough to wipe my tears?

What is it that will make me so afraid I can’t ask it all away..but just for strength to deal even one more day..
week, year..as if I know there’s no other way.
Some of us know..unsashamed to say

Still I’m happy that even though it’s only desires, curiosity,companionship,
Something brings me here every year, week..day

Though small enough to take for granted, 
sometimes.
at least I took it and its okay.
 just enough so I think my love is pure,
Like I need you to live..
Really?
Not really, Yes please..sure.

I understand that “it” really has a lot of shades darker if “it” so pleases..
Been there..seen it
Still I move feathered, unencumbered..
Till I have to go back to the one thing I really wish I could let go of
.
. 
My cross.
.
.
So I ask myself..
Happy?
What is that? How much? Who’s selling?

Thank God for Life.
Count peace itself, a blessing.
.
Happy Sunday
.
.
#happysunday #writersofinstagram #lagosphotographer

F R U S T R A T I O N

The Lone Wolf Cries:

I once asked God if she believe in me,
Whether she accept me as a deity
Or will she just wake up all my sleeping demons
All because she gets bored easily.

I’m talking bout The one that’s here but won’t appear..everywhere but might pretend to disappear..trying to tell me that I find myself when I’m without.
How?
.
.
Should I close my ears and hear you out? 
Maybe I shut my eyes to spot you
Keep my mouth shut and say everything 
Stay right here and be everywhere .
.
.
I am
.
I know you see me .
.
.

.
.
.
You can take the pain, take the joy
Take the sorrow
You can have it all 
because a lot of you are hollow
Very dead inside like affections that I follow

Cold, Dead...still I lay here sleepless
I Wonder if I’m strong enough 
to ever have a weakness
Entertaining demons, I got emptiness to fill
don’t know what I want, I got emptiness to feel
.
.
From my B.U archives
.
.

Out of Happy Sunday Pictures so I’ll do you one better..
HAPPY SABBATH pictures. 
Specially to all the Babcock Photographers that are cocking their gear, and charging cameras right about now..
Yes I was one of you
But O.Gs Shoot on Saturdays instead of Sundays. Because We never saw this stuff as work so we was well within the laws of the land. 
Anyhoo.. let it not be said that that Sun didn’t affect my eye (by that I mean..add to my art..keep up!)
.
.
P.S. if you see this girl.. tell her, That no matter how she Gives them, they will never really be able to take it 📸😜 .
.
.

R E G R E T S
.
.
.
A thousand words in these texts I shouldn’t send.
I can’t speak, I find it’s better I shoot instead
To loud? maybe... ok so let’s pretend
That we’re not dreaming and good things really DO come to an end
blind folded, sound of my voice, count to ten
You can always Find me because I’ll be there
In some way..
And In another; gone 
by the time you’re here.
.
,
.
.
.
.
.
.

I be riding round.
5d in the back
Looking for things 
that are looking for me
So I move in the dark

On sight! As I aim to kill
Though my targets end up alive forever 
I hope I’m not chasing my tail
Hope I am 
ill know when I get it
Ice cold, try figure it out or forget it.
.
.
.
.
.
*sips wine
.
.
.
.

I see clearly now..
Because I see that gratitude is the key to transforming every situation(Thank me later).
Anywhere i found myself no matter how f***ed, there was always an upside to thank God for..
Felt gratitude and voila! the whole thing flipped. Now I’m sipping Hennessy on the other side of fear..
So I’m gonna start my year on this note..
Like I’m grateful for the dark times and those that made it worth living because of the way they did..so beautiful that it made the dark times worth falling into in the first place.. .
So turn the lights off
.
Sad that Mac Miller’s Gone but happy he was able to drop swimming before he did. It was his best work so I know he’s resting in power. Felt like I knew the guy.. now I want my art to do just that!
Happy that it doesn’t look like I’d be joining the 27club I don’t know why but 21 year old me was afraid of that..we made it here so rest easy..
Grateful for good vibes and all the energy I was fed by God or the ones he sent to me..
They know themselves but just Incase they don’t then there will be pictures..
Grateful for family. Whether we on good terms or bad I never have to worry about them..a luxury I’ll stop taking for granted.
Someone insulted my legs yesterday.. I’m grateful because I over-believed my legs and got complacent, skipped on leg day. Now I’m adding 30kg to the 50kg I squat.
.
They will soon understand why I always wear shorts.
.
There’s a lot to be done..second guessing got old.
Still I thank my God because I’m..
Climbing over that wall, climbing over that wall.
I remember, yes
I remember, see 
I remember it all.
.
.
Happy Sunday and Happy New year..
.
#iphoneonly #artphotography #streetphotography #christian #happysunday #indulge_me
#magnumphotos #happynewyear #ridearoundwithvelli #writersofinstagram #lagosphotographer

Full Circle

21/21
.
.
.
All I know is that in 21 days I lived, I died, and somehow found myself on my way back to Lagos.  Wondering how long it will take them to completely suck out the energy I went to find in Oyo.
.
.
God help Us
.
.
.
.
.
.
Thank you for Banking with us.
.
.
.
End!
.
.

B O T H  E Y E S  O P EN

Hey you.

It’s me..it’s you.. you get it.. is us.
I’m writing you this to tell you that I’m proud of you. I don’t keep so many dates but I kept this one. It’s the night you had your both eyes open for the first time and took this thing of ours to the streets.
Ignant Hot headed lil niglet never listening. You was stupid but you also gave me life, like you did to every one around you.
And you’re still at it, x years after the fact. “ S T R O N G “ is officially a word that I can use to describe you. And I put that on forever man because it’s clear to me, u and us. That were clearly..never going to stop.

Love.
Velli

18/11/18 11.55 pm
.
.
.
.

The Middle. (2018)
. “We ignored the road less traveled that stretches on forever, neither did we patronize paths that held our storied footprints to memory. We stayed right here, in the middle, in this place where we can’t afford the time to regret who we had to be to get here, or contemplate how much to worry about where we are going from here.  A middle, for a moment, where we can all sit, watch others return to find meaning where we’ve already been, after traveling that beyond where whatever we’ve lost may be waiting for us.”
.
.
Oshodi, Lagos 2018
Except from “Flow (2018)”
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
Thank God for pen-wielding ghosts. 🙏🏽
.
.
.
Printed on metal, handwritten caption .
.

T O X I C
/tɒksɪk/ (Adjective)
- Who I am..inside

Emeka Onyejesi 201x

I know I’ve been off for a while on here..
Adulting is crazy, I’m trying to find a balance.  A photographer once told me that everything you are and ever will be, is in your photography so I shoot.. Recently I have been showing my of street portraiture in a nutshell I said  I like to show my subject, who he is, and what he is to his  space . Blah blah.. blah. Anyhow I’m also a photographer that doesn’t have many pictures.  I’m not camera shy, I’m just mindful about who shoots me. Or it Maybe because I was raised to think that selfies are for the weak.  And that whatever beauty you possess is not for your beholding and your indulgence alone or first of all. Does that make me a bit of a toxic male? At least I know my problems.
Mix that and what you get is sometimes, some of my concepts are initially based on myself, before I go on to project these on some other willing collaborator
 I shot this behind the scenes while on commission for @redd_moustache who is actually in this case.. the aforementioned collaborator. So this picture is in fact not a selfie.

If you think you like this shot, then zoom in

One of my personal favorites and this is how I’m killing my babies for you.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.

“Our 1960 national anthem given to us as a parting gift by a British housewife in England, had called Nigeria “our sovereign motherland” the current one put together by a commute of Nigerian intellectuals and actually worse than the first one, invokes our father image.  But it has occurred to me that Nigeria is neither my mother nor my father.  Nigeria is a child.  Gifted, enormously talented, prodigiously endowed and incredibly wayward.  Being a Nigerian is abysmally frustrating unbelievably exciting.  I have said somewhere in my next incarnation I want to be Nigerian again.” - Chinua Achebe

The flag Nigerian flag is dum too but green happens to be my favorite color.  I see it everywhere on everything. 
Happy independence to a country that doesn’t even know how long it will be able to claim “independent”. Giants 😂 🇳🇬 #nigeria #nigeriaat58 #happyindependencedaynigeria

If you’ve guys have noticed. It’s been a shadowy affair these past 7 days, every thing has been blAck, dark or dark skinned.

#spicollective #streetphotography #lensculturestreets #ourstreets #bnwphotography #ig_photooftheday #pictureoftheday #fromstreetswithlove #streetgrammer #canon #bnwmood #naturallight #streetmagazine #photobserve #bnw_demand #bnw_magazine #picoftheday #monochrome #monotone #lagos #bnw #SPi_Silhouettes #grainisgood #night #lowlightphotography #nightphotography #nightphotoshoot #myspc #mood #magnumphotos

When it comes to portraiture, I’m not your everyday (or so I prefer to think) I like to document my subject in a time and space that says something/anything about who they are or what they do or what they think. I might be gritty (no, I WILL be) but I won’t compromise the truth. So I’m at @iamtimix studio and I noticed the graffiti on the wall, and I started shooting then he comes over and starts to explain who painted which , one of the things Creatives have in common is ( I have come to notice) is how they occasionally flirt with other creative outlets besides the chosen hustle, I think it keeps the mind fluid, and informs you more of your own uniqueness.
then I placed him between the one he painted himself (right) and the one I liked the most(left).
It’s really vibes like these that money can’t buy.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.

Eye contact. .
In some parts it’s considered rude to stare directly in the eyes of an elder. No matter how just your cause. That’s how I feel when I look at the sun.. like I’m staring into the eye of something bigger. That has never taken its eye off me, it knows my every move and knows me more than I do myself.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
